description: 'The Forever machine', Galaxy Science Fiction Novels Number 35, 1958. Published by Galaxy Publishing Company, 421 Hudson Street, New York 14, New York. Written by Mark Clifton and Frank Riley. Dimensions are 4 1/4" width by 6 3/8" Height and weight 79.8 grams, 160 pages. Copyright was reported in 1953, but no registration or renewal was recorded, this work is Public Domain under Rule 6 of the Copyright Statutes of the United States.
